text.title: Investigators blame pilot error for deadly jet crash near Boston
text.head: Investigators blame pilot error for deadly jet crash near Boston
Sources

list.item: Bart Jansen. "NTSB: Pilots left flaps locked in place in Gulfstream crash that killed 7" — USA Today , September 10, 2015
Mark Pratt (AP). "NTSB: Crew Neglected Pre-Flight Check in Crash That Killed 7" — ABC News (United States) , September 9, 2015
Martin DeAngelis. "Pilots skipped safety steps in crash that killed Longport's Katz, Leeds" — The Press of Atlantic City , September 9, 2015
Press Release. "Series of Errors by Flight Crew Caused Fatal Business Jet Crash, NTSB Says" — National Transportation Safety Board , September 9, 2015
